parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the firewall welds can cause the clutch pedal bracket to break away from the firewall, leading to loss of clutch function, difficulty shifting gears, and potentially causing an accident.
symptoms: Clutch pedal makes a creaking or squeaking noise
clutch pedal moves or shifts when depressed
difficulty shifting into gear
especially reverse
brake pedal moves or shifts when clutch pedal is depressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure due to Internal Connecting-Rod Bearing Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the internal connecting-rod bearing can cause the engine to seize, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Loud knocking noise
metal sound
white smoke when starting up
smoke in the oil when the car is running
engine failure
sudden loss of power
engine vibration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition coil can cause the engine to fail, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Engine failure
cracked ignition coil.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the firewall can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
creaking and popping sounds when the clutch is depressed
excessive movement of the clutch master cylinder
and the brake pedal moves to the left when pressing the clutch.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause accidents or injuries due to the inability to stop the vehicle in time.
symptoms: The brake light is flashing
the vehicle is unable to stop in time
and the brake pedal is spongy or soft.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the child safety lock can cause the door to become stuck, making it difficult or impossible to exit the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The door will not open from the inside
even when the child lock is in the free position
and the child lock is stuck in the locked position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sun visor droop can cause visibility issues, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The sun visor droops
causing visibility issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive body flex can cause the windshield to crack, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Excessive body flex when turning
air coming in
and the windshield is cracked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch master cylinder can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
and the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Vehicle Design and Safety Features for Average-Height Drivers
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to design vehicles with safety features that accommodate average-height drivers, particularly women, can lead to increased risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Difficulty reaching the accelerator and seeing over the dashboard
requiring drivers to sit in the "death zone" of the driver airbags and steering wheel column.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in repairing recalled Takata airbags can lead to increased risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Unavailable parts
lack of estimated time for repair
and inconsistent communication from dealerships and manufacturers.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of seat belts and airbags can lead to increased risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Seat belt failure
airbag failure to deploy
and multiple injuries sustained.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the occupant detection system can lead to airbag failure, increasing the risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Passenger airbag does not turn on when passenger sits on it
requiring bouncing up and down to activate.
